name: Mixed Signals
description:
Description

Mixed Signals is a beat 'em up game developed for the SGDA Arcade Game Jam. The game is set in the small town of Pystal Beach and stars Harley, a freshman in college attending Pystal Beach University. 

Waking up early at 7pm, Harley discovers her phone is dead and her charger broken. Annoyed, she reluctantly leaves her dorm room to go buy a new charger.  What was supposed to be a quick trip ends up being a night of fistfighting and flirting.

Team
  • Aliya Lee - Character and Environment Art
  • Keala Chesnut - Sprite Art/Animations
  • Kem Echezona - Sound/UI
  • Gabriel Salomone - Programming
Controls
  • Move - WASD
  • Punch - J
  • Kick - K
  • Kiss - L

Third Party Assets

Music

  • BOSS_AF_LOOP - clonethirteen
  • breakingpoint - clonethirteen
  • Heaviest_of_crowns - clonethirteen
  • Chippy music 12 - chippy01302
  • sparkle-stars - retroindiejosh

UI

  • Pixel Buttons - betadv
  • Pixeled Font - OmegaPC777

Note: There was supposed to be sound during the game but it broke TT
